Daniel Huang.title: CEO @ Monet
Daniel Huang.bio: Daniel Huang is a 20 year-old self-taught mobile / web developer and mechanical engineering student. In 2020, he co-founded Monet, a doodle-based dating and friend making mobile app which hit Apple's TestFlight limit of 10,000 users and received venture funding within weeks of its beta launch.

Justin Zheng.title: CEO @ Matrix
Justin Zheng.bio: JZ is the CEO of Matrix, where he works on esports, crypto, and creating a better fan/creator experience. He's also previously done several crypto fellowships at IDEO CoLab.

Crystal Hunt.title: Senior PM @ Shopify
Crystal Hunt.bio: Crystal Hunt is a Senior Program Manager - Partnerships, on the Diversity and Belonging team at Shopify. Crystal is bringing more voices to entrepreneurship and is reducing the barriers to entry for people from underrepresented communities, and is building partnerships with organizations to help further our mission.

Michael Ioffe.title: CEO @ Arist (YC20)
Michael Ioffe.bio: Michael Ioffe is the co-founder and CEO of Arist, a platform that helps leading companies and nonprofits rapidly create, launch, and assess text message-based courses. For his work on Arist, Michael has been named a Forbes 30 under 30. Previously, Michael founded TILE.org, an entrepreneurship education nonprofit with over 450 locations.

Ge Wang.title: Professor @ Stanford
Ge Wang.bio: Ge Wang is an Associate Professor at Stanford University’s Center for Computer Research in Music and Acoustics. He is the Co-founder of Smule and the designer of the Ocarina and Magic Piano apps for mobile phones. A 2016 Guggenheim Fellow, Ge is the author of Artful Design: Technology in Search of the Sublime.

Vivian Li.title: Senior D&I Leader @ RBC
Vivian Li.bio: Vivian Li is a senior Diversity and Inclusion leader working for Canada’s best diversity employer.  Vivian and her team has supported over 5000 candidates from diverse communities in their job search over the past 4 years. Vivian has over 15 years of experience in HR and HR technology. Vivian holds a Master’s Degree from China.

Yash Godiwala.title: CoS @ Fion Technologies
Yash Godiwala.bio: Yash Godiwala is Chief of Staff at Fion Technologies, a deeptech co (backed by Justin Kan, Sahil Lavingia and more) using GIS-enabled machine learning models to identify and analyze wildfires. He also works part-time on the platform team at Contrary, a venture firm investing in top early career talent.

Sophia Dhrolia.title: Director of D&I and Engagement @ Toronto Region Board of Trade
Sophia Dhrolia.bio: Sophia Dhrolia (she/they) is passionate about building a culture that values diversity, champions inclusion, and promotes collaboration to drive results. They are committed to developing environments where differences are respected and valued and where people are empowered to be their authentic selves and have equitable opportunities to thrive.

Omna Toshniwal.title: Senior PM @ Consensys
Omna Toshniwal.bio: Omna does Product Management at MetaMask / ConsenSys. She has an unwavering focus on social responsibility and is attracted to products that help improve people’s lives in real and significant ways. She has a background in HCI, and has worked mainly in FinTech & HealthTech, for global markets.

Rahul Rana.title: Summer Associate @ Lux Capital
Rahul Rana.bio: Rahul Rana is an Associate at Lux Capital, a $2.5bn deeptech VC firm. He is the author of Making Moonshots—a deep dive into the mindsets, philosophies, and strategies conducive to building impactful moonshot companies. Also, he is a sophomore at Rutgers University studying Astrophysics and Finance.
